content: {"name": "St. Mary's Community Outreach", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Requirements: Current ID, SSC, and two pieces of mail verifying the address for all adults in the household. For any minor children we need birth certificate, SSC, and one piece of ID like a Medicaid card, school record for school aged kids.\n\nIf they live in the perimeter of Palmer Rd to Van Born Rd and Haggerty to Venoy Rd. they do not need a referral from a Catholic Church. If they live outside of that area they will need a referral from a local church. The churches have our paperwork. Just tell them that you want to come to our food bank and they will fill it out. Also, we do not service people living in Inkster, Romulus or Belleville.  ", "email": "", "url": "https://stmarywayne.org/st-mary-community-outreach-cente", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "34646 Sims Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Wayne", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48184", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.2829981, "longitude": -83.38073349999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(734) 326-2234", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Referral required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once in 2 months"}]}
